title: we believe
description: Here at WOLF, we stand firm for what we believe in -

details.scope: of work, we make sure the design process is enjoyable, simple and successful for all our clientsdesign consultancydesign & buildfeasibility studiesvisual contentour hideoutour hideoutsOur space is an expression of who we are and we all have a little piece of our identity here. This is our second home and we love going to work. Come and visits either at our Industrial or CBD design studio locations in Singapore or Hongkong..comp-lew94m3u {
details.year: s of collective workplace design experience

title: A workplace without boundaries
description: The project itself comprised of 2 different locations, which were at 80 Bendemeer and Harbourfront. The key concept was to have a different design theme across the 2 spaces while also creating a connection across all IHH locations. The key design challenge was to strike that balance between introducing different design elements so each location would have a its own unique flavour and expression, but at the same time have that unifying signature IHH element and branding.

title: A piece of the sky
description: The clients new Singapore headquarters spans 60,000 sq ft, overlooking Singapore’s Southern shoreline at 79 Robinson Road, and is symbolic of a people-centric workplace in a post-pandemic world.

title: Delivering a Smoke-Free Future
description: When Wolf was engaged to design the the new Philip Morris office in Singapore, it was an opportunity to design a workplace that would be  symbolic of the company's ongoing transformation to building a future on replacing cigarettes with smoke-free alternatives.
